meanings.meaning: 1. to avoid (physical contact with) Only applies to よけるそのスピードを出した車は道路に飛び出した子供を、間一髪で、避けることができた。The speeding car missed the child, who ran out into the road, by only a hairsbreadth.
2. to avoid (situation); to evade (question, subject); to shirk (one's responsibilities) Only applies to さけるあなたはいやな経験を避けるかもしれない。You might avoid an unpleasant experience.
3. to ward off; to avert
4. to put aside; to move out of the way Only applies to よける
避ける 【よける】、除ける 【よける】
除ける: Rarely-used kanji form.
1. to avoid (physical contact with) Only applies to よけるそのスピードを出した車は道路に飛び出した子供を、間一髪で、避けることができた。The speeding car missed the child, who ran out into the road, by only a hairsbreadth.
2. to avoid (situation); to evade (question, subject); to shirk (one's responsibilities) Only applies to さけるあなたはいやな経験を避けるかもしれない。You might avoid an unpleasant experience.
3. to ward off; to avert
4. to put aside; to move out of the way Only applies to よける
避ける 【よける】、除ける 【よける】
除ける: Rarely-used kanji form.

sentences.translation: The speeding car missed the child, who ran out into the road, by only a hairsbreadth.
You might avoid an unpleasant experience.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to leave; to go away １９００年に彼はイギリスを去り、そのまま二度と戻らなかった。In 1900, he left England, and he never returned.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to pass; to elapse 古き良き時代は去って、二度ともどってこない。The good old days have gone, never to return.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to be distant

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to send away; to drive off; to divorce

meanings.type: Auxiliary verb, Godan verb with 'ru' ending
meanings.meaning: 5. to (do) completely after a -masu stem, esp. of a suru verb
6. last ... (e.g. "last April") Only applies to 去る, Antonym: 来る きたる去る６月に私の姉は高校の教師と結婚した。My sister married a high school teacher last June.
避る 【さる】
